Gale must climb atop alone.

How to Obtain Ending:

When Gale tells you "I'm ready. Are you?" Reply to him with the second option: "Wait. We could end this now if you unleashed the orb." Then, choose the Persuasion check and pass the DC of 30: "We did, but look at the devastation around us. You need to end this now."
